item.title: [Python] Statistical test second grade, passing almost only on Youtube
item.description: I have studied a lot to prepare for the Level 2 statistical test, but I will tell you how to study if this is all you need. All you need is a PC and one book. Learning method First, let’s buy the official collection of questions. Check the scope of the questions in the official problem collection, and confirm the areas to be asked. Get a rough understanding of the relevant fields on Statistics WEB.
